metadata.title: Ever Knitting | Professional Knitwear Manufacturer in China and Cambodia
metadata.description: Ever Knitting is a professional knitwear manufacturer offering OEM & ODM services for fashion brands, wholesalers, and private label companies.

hero.title: Premium Cashmere & Knitwear Manufacturer
hero.subtitle: Factory-direct production of high-quality cashmere sweaters and knitted garments.
hero.subtitleLine2: From sampling to bulk orders, tailored for global brands.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team
contact.heroSubtitle: Whether you are an established brand looking for a new partner or a startup launching your first collection, we are here to help.

form.name: Your Name
form.success: Thank you! We will get back to you soon.
form.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

footer.copyright: © {year} Ever Knitting Company Limited. All rights reserved.
footer.description: Premium knitwear manufacturer specializing in luxury cashmere and high-end blends since 1993.

about.title: About Ever Knitting
about.subtitle: 15+ years of excellence in knitwear manufacturing
about.heroSubtitle: Since 2008, Ever Knitting has been the silent partner behind some of the world's most prestigious fashion brands.
about.storyP1: Founded in the heart of Dongguan's textile district, Ever Knitting started with just five knitting machines and a dream to redefine quality.
about.storyP2: Over the last 15 years, we have expanded into a state-of-the-art facility employing over 200 skilled artisans and technicians. We blend traditional hand-finishing techniques with modern automated technology to deliver garments that truly stand out.
about.storyP3: We believe that every stitch matters. From the tension of the yarn to the final steam, our obsession with detail is what sets us apart.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.desc: Honest pricing and transparent communication with all our clients.

quality.title: Quality
quality.desc: Zero tolerance for defects. If it's not perfect, it doesn't leave our factory.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: Constantly exploring new knitting structures, yarns, and sustainable practices.

materials.title: Premium Materials
materials.subtitle: We source only the finest materials for our knitwear
materials.heroSubtitle: We source only the finest yarns from around the globe. Does your brand require silky cashmere, durable merino, or sustainable organic cotton? We have the perfect fiber for every masterpiece.

cashmere.title: Pure Cashmere
cashmere.desc: Known as "soft gold," our cashmere is sourced from inner Mongolia. It offers unparalleled softness, warmth, and luxury for premium collections.

merino.title: Merino Wool
merino.desc: Extra-fine Merino wool that is breathable, moisture-wicking, and incredibly soft against the skin. Perfect for versatile, year-round knitwear.

cotton.title: Cotton & Eco Blends
cotton.desc: Organic cotton, recycled polyester, and innovative eco-blends for the environmentally conscious brand. Sustainable without compromising quality.

materials.sourcingDesc: Our material sourcing team travels the world to find yarns that meet our rigorous standards. We maintain strong relationships with top-tier spinners in Italy, Japan, and Peru to ensure consistency and excellence in every spool.

process.title: Our Process
process.subtitle: From design to delivery, we ensure quality at every step
process.heroSubtitle: Precision engineering meets artisanal craftsmanship. See how we bring your designs to life.

step1.title: Design & Consultation
step1.desc: We begin by understanding your vision. Our design team collaborates with you to select yarns, define gauges, and finalize tech packs.

step2.title: Prototyping & Sampling
step2.desc: We create a physical sample for your approval. This ensures the fit, feel, and look meet your exact specifications before bulk production.

step3.title: Bulk Production
step3.desc: Using state-of-the-art Shima Seiki and Stoll machines, we begin mass production with strict adherence to the approved sample.

step4.title: Quality Control
step4.desc: Every piece undergoes a multi-stage inspection process. We check for measurements, knitting defects, and finishing quality.

step5.title: Finishing & Packaging
step5.desc: Garments are washed, steamed, labeled, and packed according to your retail requirements, ready for shipment.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services
faq.heroSubtitle: Everything you need to know about working with Ever Knitting.
faq.notFound: Can't find what you're looking for?
